sentences.en: All finished metal surfaces, such as chrome, aluminum, brass, stainless, etc.
sentences.cn: 所有抛光金属表面, 像铬合金 、 铝 、 黄铜 、 不锈钢等.

sentences.en: B : Satin nickel and chrome are the most popular color.
sentences.cn: 沙镍和烙是最受欢迎的.

sentences.en: Engages in the production of die mould material, large forging, and chrome steel flange.
sentences.cn: 公司从一九九六年建立以来,从各大钢厂吸取技术, 引进各大型锻打设备及炼钢技术.

sentences.en: Finish: antique brass, polished brass, chrome and natural iron.
sentences.cn: 备有颜色: 古铜, 金铜, 光铬及天然铁色以供选择.

sentences.en: Finish: antique brass, polished brass, chrome, dark chrome and natural iron.
sentences.cn: 备有颜色: 古铜, 金铜, 光铬, 黑镍及天然铁色以供选择.

sentences.en: Now, new models use nice, shiny chrome, hex - head screws.
sentences.cn: 现在, 新的模型使用漂亮的, 有光泽的镀铬六角形镙丝.

sentences.en: Professional introduction of the latest matt chromium ( chromium Shading ) nickel, chrome - plating process.
sentences.cn: 专业引进最新的亚光铬 ( 沙丁铬 ) 镀镍, 镀铬工艺.

sentences.en: Right now black and chrome rims are the most popular.
sentences.cn: 现在黑色和铬合金轮毂是最受欢迎的.

sentences.en: So why buy painted custom made rims when you can have chrome?
sentences.cn: 为什么买画定制了钢圈时,你可以有铬?

sentences.en: The advanced DYNA - CHROME electroplating technology for automotive shock absorber rod was introduced in detail.
sentences.cn: 详细介绍了当今世界上最先进的汽车减振器杆硬铬电镀技术(DYNA-CHROME).

sentences.en: The experimental research prepared for numerical simulation of high - chrome castings.
sentences.cn: 该研究为高铬铸铁件热应力场的数值模拟打下了实验基础.

sentences.en: The knob itself is plated with chrome or nickel.
sentences.cn: 把手本身镀了一层铬或镍.

sentences.en: The solid curve is chrome - tanned leather which is a cationic substrate.
sentences.cn: 固态曲面为铬鞣革,作为阳离子基.

sentences.en: There is a lot of chrome on cars of that model.
sentences.cn: 那种牌子的汽车上涂有许多铬黄.

sentences.en: Water faucets shall be chrome - plated type with ball valve.

trans.tran_en: a type of hard shiny metal
